oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: CMA awards radio spots - various artists - 1971
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recordings of CMA award radio spots featuring Tennessee Ernie Ford, Loretta Lynn, Marty Robbins, Jerry Reed, Danny Davis, Tompall Glaser, Merle Haggard, and Glen Campbell, recorded in 1971.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) CMA awards radio spot (Tennessee Ernie Ford) -- (00:23) CMA awards radio spot (Loretta Lynn) -- (00:51) CMA awards radio spot (Marty Robbins) -- (01:25) CMA awards radio spot (Jerry Reed) -- (01:55) CMA awards radio spot (Danny Davis) -- (02:22) CMA awards radio spot (Tompall Glaser) -- (02:54) CMA awards radio spot (Merle Haggard) -- (03:21) CMA awards radio spot (Glen Campbell)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Country Music Association (U.S.); Ford, Tennessee Ernie, 1919-1991; Lynn, Loretta, 1932-; Robbins, Marty; Reed, Jerry; Davis, Danny; Glaser, Tompall; Haggard, Merle, 1937-2016; Campbell, Glen, 1936-2017;
